argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | drngpropd.1 | |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 2 |  | drngpropd.2 | |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` L ) ) |
| 3 |  | drngpropd.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` K ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` L ) y ) ) |
| 4 |  | drngpropd.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( .r ` K ) y ) = ( x ( .r ` L ) y ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_drngpropd | |- ( ph -> ( K e. DivRing <-> L e. DivRing ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_crngpropd | |- ( ph -> ( K e. CRing <-> L e. CRing ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( ph -> ( ( K e. DivRing /\ K e. CRing ) <-> ( L e. DivRing /\ L e. CRing ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_isfld | |- ( K e. Field <-> ( K e. DivRing /\ K e. CRing ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_isfld | |- ( L e. Field <-> ( L e. DivRing /\ L e. CRing ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_3bitr4g | |- ( ph -> ( K e. Field <-> L e. Field ) ) |
